author: Michael Rapoport
title: Sears’ Going Concern Talk: The Two Sides of the Warning - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text:
michael.rapoport.7 Mar 23, 2017 9:53 am ET 
jolted investors this week when it said it had doubts about its ability to stay in business. But investors should make sure they are paying attention to all of what the company is saying. The retail giant said Tuesday in its annual report that it had “substantial doubt” about its ability “to continue as a […]
